SEARCH
Package civitas.celestis.event.lifecycle

Interface EventManager

All Superinterfaces:
Module
All Known Implementing Classes:
EventThread, SyncEventManager
public interface EventManager extends Module
An event manager handles the lifecycle of events and event listeners. Events are processed by calling an event by means of call(Handleable), and event listeners can be registered and unregistered by their respective methods.
See Also:
  • SyncEventManager

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    <E extends Handleable>
    void
    call(E event)
    Calls an event to this event manager, instructing it to process the event as soon as possible.
    <E extends Handleable>
    void
    priorityCall(E event)
    Calls an event to this event manager, instructing it to prioritize this event over all other events currently in the event queue.
    void
    register(Listener listener)
    Registers an event listener to this event manager.
    void
    register(Iterable<? extends Listener> listeners)
    Registers multiple event listeners to this event manager.
    void
    unregister(Listener listener)
    Unregisters an event listener from this event manager.
    void
    unregister(Iterable<? extends Listener> listeners)
    Unregisters multiple event listeners from this event manager.

    Methods inherited from interface civitas.celestis.util.Module

    initialize, interrupt, start, terminate

      Calls an event to this event manager, instructing it to process the event as soon as possible.

      Parameters:

      Type Parameters:
